transcript:
Customer: Ho gaya ji madam main jinne bhi hoya dasda ji thonu.
Haa sir.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Hello.
Customer: Haan good morning sir.
Executive: Namashkar sir ji.
Customer: Ji Himanshu baat kar raha hu, bataiye.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji haan sir.
Customer: Bataiye kal thoda discussion hui thi, brief aap se. Bataiye fir aage kaise kya karna hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Bataiye fir aage kaise isko conclude karni hai sir cheezo ko.
Executive: Nahi vo to kar lete hai ji. Baat aisi hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Agar main koi baat kahu aapko mahsus to nahi hoga.
Executive: Sir aap apni baat rakhiye, mahsus kya jo aap keh rahe hai feedback acknowledge hoga sir, bataiye.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Bataiye.
Customer: Sir baat aisi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kyunki pehle to mere sath matlab ki Abhishek sir ne kiya hai ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Theek hai ji, hum vahi cheez ko latak rahe hai ji.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Agar aap kal ki baat karoge to aaj ki baat kare to us hisab se hai. Aapne jaise kaha ji matlab ki package wala bhi hum 50% discount de rahe hai. Vo to sir natural rate hi itna hai ji.
Customer: Jo aap bol rahe hai mujhe 165 wala ji.
Executive: Sir, actually uska vo 2 lakh ka hai sir, usko discount karke hum 165 aapko bataya sir aapko, 165 ka.
Customer: Kis ka discount naam hai, kis ka rate hi uska 165 hai ji. Sir matlab ki baat aisi hai.
Executive: Aap jo perform bheja check kijiye vaha pe.
Customer: Sir maine check kar liya hai ji. Aapne kaunsa bheja hai ji sir.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hello. Uska kisi bhi kisi bhi pharma franchise. Ek minute ji main ek paase beh jaa ji uthe aawaz aa rahi si.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: CCTV pharma franchise ki.
Executive: Haan ji haan sir.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Jo aap bol rahe hai na sir teen wala teen piece wala, vo to leader ka pack hai ji. Aap mujhe leader.
Executive: Haan vo leader.
Executive: Nahi leader wala nahi de raha sir main aapko ye de raha hu preferred star de raha hu all India wala.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Preferred star all India wala.
Customer: Haan par all India wala vo 165 ka vo vaise hi hai ji.
Executive: Nahi nahi 2 lakh plus GST ka hai sir.
Customer: 2 lakh plus GST ka hai.
Executive: Dekh lijiye.
Customer: Aapko main aapko 165 mein vaise hi dila du. Main ek piece mein dila du ji discount karke.
Customer: Ek piece.
Executive: Bilkul sir aap dilwa lijiye main aapko WhatsApp bheja check kijiye aap.
Executive: Price check kar lijiye.
Customer: Sir pata kya hai, main aise nahi hai.
Executive: Aap matlab ki agar customer aapke sath sahi hai, uske sath matlab ki galat na karo ji.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir. Pata kya hai. Sir dekho price hamara already teen mahine pehle hi badh chuka hai 2 lakh plus GST ho gaya but hum usko old rate mein karke de rahe hai to isliye vo discount hi hai aise jata jo new client ko jata hai 2 lakh plus GST ka hi jata hai sir.
Customer: Vo to humne nahi karana ji, humne matlab ki nahi karana kyunki kyunki vo saari hamare sath cheating ho rahi hai ji kya karenge hum.
Executive: Sir aapko WhatsApp kiya aap check kar lijiye. Aap jo bhi mere se jo communication hoga mail pe hoga.
Customer: Galat keh rahe hai sir aapko. Haan bataiye. Maano maine aapko kaha bhi matlab ki aapne kaha teen piece wala, main kaha ji hamare paas itni power nahi hai abhi hum teen piece wala. Vo leader ka tha vo to leader ka tha na main ye aapko teen piece wala nahi de raha hu main aapko. Aap usko matlab ki 50% discount de rahe the.
Executive: Sir 165 rate hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi 2 lakh 50 de rahe the.
Executive: Sir 165 rate nahi hai 2 lakh plus GST rate hai usko maine aapko 165 diya sir. Aap check karo na WhatsApp check kijiye bhej diya aapko.
Customer: Mujhe mujhe matlab ki saara kuch na maine aapka.
Executive: Nahi nahi galat jisne bhi communicate kiya dekho aap abhi bhi agar Abhishek ji ya fir unka bhi mail aata hai ki ha insist kare hum aapko insist kar hi nahi rahe ki aap vo page lo all India wala ya fir jo bhi hai vo to aapne mujhse manga kal ki date mein isliye maine aapko suggest kiya.
Customer: Main aapke sath baat kar raha tha aise thodi hai sir pehle hi usko 2 lakh wala bata de 165 wala bata de ji.
Executive: Main suggest main suggest nahi kar raha hu vo to aapne mujhe manga to isliye pehle aapne aapko pata kya hai aapne bola lakh tak kuch suno to meri baat main pehle aapko. Sir ek minute meri baat sun lijiye.
Executive: Haan ji haan. Aapne mujhe bola ki wala do to maine aapko leader ka price share kiya aapne bola ki nahi ek dedh lakh mein. Suno suno meri baat suno kya hai main baat batai. Aapne bola ek sava lakh wala aap bata do to isliye maine aapko preferred star ka bataya ki ye 2 lakh ka MRP hai aapko discount.
Customer: Maine kyun kaha, main teen mahine se matlab ki bhatak raha hu main. Itne paise laga ke aapko saara kuch samne kar diya matlab ki sab kuch okay ho gaya. Aapke samne Abhishek sir ko bhi kara diya madam ko bhi kara diya saare staff ko aapne bol diya saara kuch lead check karwa di bhi hamare paas kisi tarah ki koi lead nahi aati saare staff ne bol diya bhi 40000 wale mein koi lead nahi aayegi. Aapne hame teen mahine gumrah kiya.
Executive: Nahi ji maine aapko main to kal bhi aapko bola tha aayegi aur aapka jo 32000 plus 28000.
Customer: Hum to mar gaye ji. Sir matlab 40000 ka koi insan mein bol raha hai kam aayegi hum jab dub gaye ji.
Executive: Sir 40000 ka koi package nahi hai aapne jo liya hai 28 nahi aayi ji. Sir 28000 plus GST ka package liya aapne 33000 40 koi 40000 ka nahi liya abhi 28000 plus GST ka hai uska vo aapka purana rate chal raha tha hamara MDC ka.
Customer: Discount mila hai na ji hame.
Executive: Haan to 28000 ka hi to package hai aapko jo purane rate mein mila hua hai MDC ka abhi to naya rate hai.
Customer: Aapne koi aapne koi hame matlab ki extra koi de diya ji hamare sath nahi kiya aapne 40000 kiya tha ji.
Executive: Sir 40000 keh rahe hai uski baat bata raha hu sir aapko ki aap 40000 keh rahe hai 65000.
Customer: Pata kya hai aap usko discuss kya kar rahe hai. Main aapko correct kar raha tha ki itna invest kiya hai aapne 40000 nahi kiya ye main aapko bata raha tha bas.
Executive: Mera ye thodi matlab hai ki 40 ka hua 50 ka hua main to correct kar raha tha ki 40 nahi tha vo aapne 28000 plus GST pay kiya tha sir.
Customer: Jo bhi hai sir pata kya hai jo bhi hai na saara kuch hai vo badh nahi sakta vo kam nahi ho sakta. To aap kehte hai lead aayegi kaha se lead aayegi ji.
Customer: Jab lead hi nahi aati ji kaha aayegi.
Customer: To hum isliye bola tha aapko bhi kal ko dikkat aayegi aapko dikkat aayegi hame dikkat aayegi kyunki hum party banayenge bhi aapne hamare sath cheating ki hai. Sab kuch open ho gaya saara kuch aapko bata diya saara kuch ho diya. Aap jab bhi kehte hai bata rahe hai bata rahe hai aapko humne baat ki thi over matlab ki lekar ki hum sir aapse baat kar rahe hai iska koi platform nahi hai bhi aapse baat kar rahe hai. Hum usko hal chahte the bhi kya hai kya nahi aapne hame kaha bhi 30 30 wala package hum 165 mein de rahe hai. Aapse kal baat hui na aapne.
Executive: Nahi sir vo leading supplier ka tha main 2 lakh wala aapko. Meri baat suno meri baat suno 2 lakh ki baat hui kal agar 2 lakh ki baat hui hai main aapka den dar niklunga aapne kaha 3 30 ka pack hai hum aapko main bhi 50% discount hum aapko 50%.
Customer: Sir pehle baat suno na ji. Aapko main dono cheeze WhatsApp kar di aap check kar lijiye aap galat usko conversation ko galat leke ja rahe ho dono ka price maine aapko bhej diya haan check kar lijiye WhatsApp pe.
Executive: Aap WhatsApp check kar lijiye.
Customer: Sir usko chhodo sir kya banega humne nahi karna ji. Hamare wala batao kya kar rahe ho ji chhodo isko humne kam nahi karna.
Executive: Haan vo mat kijiye usko. Sir humne koi aapko suggest bhi nahi kiya tha ki aap kijiye vo aapne aage se manga hai hame to aapko jo present hai usme suggest karna hai.
Customer: Jo loss hua hai teen mahine ka aapne hamare matlab ki sath cheating ki hai aapke staff ne uska kya action banta hai hamara kya jana mil raha hai ji batao bas kya cheating kar liya bataiye kya cheating ho gayi.
Executive: Koi cheating vagera.
Customer: India level.
Customer: Hame India level ka keh kar becha gaya ji. Ek minute sir ek minute ji.
Executive: Hello. Sir main main panj minute rok ke karda main do minute ji.
Executive: Te sir pehli baat to ye hai hame jo plan diya gaya all India ka bol kar diya gaya hai plan. Humne all India ka package liya tha hame pata laga ek mahine baad bhi all India wala.
Executive: Package all India ka hi hai sir package to all India hai na but listing niche hai kyunki MDC services chali hai mini dynamic starting services hai to us vajah se listing niche hai plan to all India ka hi hai aisa thodi hai ki aapka local koi plan hai plan aapka all India ka hi hai but aapki listing niche hai kyunki hamari base services hai bas.
Customer: Kaha pe listing hai ji, kaha pe listing hai.
Executive: Sir ek category mein hamare paas agar.
Customer: Kaha pe listing hai kaha aap sir bol do na hame kis pe listing hai.
Executive: Aap check kijiye na 15 mein 20 mein page pe to aayega hi na sir listing to aayegi.
Customer: Sir niche dekhegi baat suno aap mujhe dekho aap mujhe koi bhi action lena hai aap bata do kya action pe lena hai main usi hisab se aapse chalunga maine koi aapse kam nahi matlab kiya mere paas 420 bhi hui hai sabne aapke kiya hai jo bhi baat hui hai by mere paas uska hai bhi mere paas jo liya tha ji uske baad bhi teen mahine ho gaye saara hamara.
Executive: Kya hai aap mujhe share kar dijiye aisa kuch communicate commitment diya hua tha usne ya fir kuch hai to aap mujhe share kar dijiye sir problem nahi hai main aage forward kar deta hu team mein.
Executive: Chalo dekho ji ye hai aapko maine humne sold out wala sold award wali problem thi humne aapko bula ke dikhaya ki ha itne lead generate ho rahi hai sold out hai listing ke.
Customer: Main aapko main wala hi batata hu aapke staff ka unhone bola hai aapke paas koi lead nahi aa rahi aayegi bhi nahi main vahi bechta hu saara kuch hai mere paas matlab ki iska koi action loge to theek hai nahi by matlab ki main jo apni karvai banti hai main usi hisab se karunga ji mujhe aap leke bhej do mail pe bhi matlab ki aise karke saara kuch sahi kiya hua hai aap bol do bhi India level ka hai mujhe bhej do leke mail pe ji maine aapko.
Executive: India level ki koi hamari alag alag service thodi hoti hai local level ki jo India base ki hai aapki base services hai.
Customer: Vo maine dekhna hai maine kya karna hai agar main paise de sakta hu mera 5 lakh ka nuksan hua hai main uska.
Executive: Sir aapne 5 lakh ki services nahi li hai kuch 5 lakh ki services nahi li hai sir aapne 28000 plus GST 33000 43000.
Customer: 3 mahine ho gaye hamare matlab ki nahi 5 lakh ki service nahi li hamara jo nuksan ho gaya ji teen mahine mein aapne hame koi lead nahi di ji uski lead band ki hui hai mere paas kalla kalla photo hai iske paas bheji hui ji aapke paas sir.
Customer: Aapke staff ka bola hua hai bhi ispe koi lead nahi aati ji 40000 mein.
Customer: Jo 30000 mein diya hua hai.
Executive: 40000 ki service 28000 ki sir 28000 ki service thi.
Customer: Jo maine paisa diya hua hai us pe aapke staff dwara bola gaya hai bhi is pe koi lead nahi aayegi ji.
Customer: Batao aap kya karna hai ji.
Executive: Lead aa rahi hai sir valid consume kar rahe ho aapke koi keh rahe ho koi valid nahi hai lead to consumption ho raha hai na sir lead bhi consume kar rahe ho calls bhi aa rahi hai inquiry bhi aa rahi hai sabka flow kam hai.
Customer: Lead kya karenge sir lead hi nahi aati ji teen teen din purani 10 10 din purani lead aati hai ji.
Executive: Sabka mujhe pata kya hai kam hai.
Customer: Sir meri baat main aapko ek vinti kar raha hu meri baat sun lo ji final baat sun lo agar mujhe 24 ghante mein kuch bata sakte ho to bata do nahi main apna jo bhi karvai.
Executive: Kya batau aap batao na kya solution hai kya aap cha rahe ho bata dijiye mujhe sir.
Customer: Sir aap to 420 bhi to sath mein kar rahe ho 300 330 wala aapko package bol kar.
Executive: Maine aapko WhatsApp kar diya sir koi in cheezo mein clarity aapko de diya WhatsApp kar diya sir aap check kar lijiye WhatsApp kar diya aapko.
Executive: Aapko jo bhi jinhone bhi communicate kiya galat communicate kiya aap check kar lijiye ye aapka jo 4 lakh ka hai package vo aapka 330 mein mil jayega preferred leader aur jo aapka 2 lakh ka package hai vo aapko 165000 mein mil jayega ek clarity hai maine aapko WhatsApp kar diya mail karna hai mail dal deta hu jaha aapko chahiye vaha main dal deta hu clear hai sir 2 lakh ka package hai.
Customer: Sir hame kuch nahi chahiye but aap keh rahe ho na bas vo cheez maine clear kar diya sir.
Executive: Haan matlab ki aap vo aapki marzi sir mujhe maine kal bhi nahi bola tha main kabhi aapko suggest bhi nahi kiya main to aapko resolve karne ke ke liye hi call kiya tha video meeting mein maine koi package ke liye aapko bola bhi nahi hai suggest bhi nahi kiya maine.
Customer: Karne ke liye baat kar rahe the na bhi hum vyapari log hai aise.
Executive: Nahi aapka samne se call aaya tha ki mujhe bataiye main aapko maine kuch aapko suggest nahi kiya i never try to sell you anything or guide you about the services sir i just want to acknowledge your problem and that i have already done on the video meeting explain everything but your expectation is very high sir so you need to some time.
Customer: Mainu ek gal dasda sir mainu angreji angruji de vich gal karan di na sikhayo angreji vaste ta main bahut kuch kar dunga meri gal punjabi vich chal rahi hai na.
Customer: Gal punjabi vich chal rahi hai mainu samjhan di gal na kareyo sir thodi shan de vich koi gal kahi jaugi is tarah da mainu koi gal na keho main thonu dassa main je tusi mainu punjabi angreji di gal karde ho.
Executive: Aap bataiye main isko further process karau aap jo bhi hai details aap bhej dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Main taahi thonu dass reha na meri gal aram naal chal rahi hai inu aram naal sun ke aram naal eda hal kar lo je angreji angruji de vich mainu bahut kuch karna aanda main thonu dassa main.
Customer: Haan batao sir kya karna hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer claims of being misled for 3 months.

- Claims staff stated no leads in 40000 plan.

- Wants action on staff for alleged cheating.

- Wants written confirmation of India level plan.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified pricing, discounts, and package details.

- Executive offered to send details via WhatsApp/mail.

- Executive stated he never tried to sell anything.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share communication for review.



Alert (If Any):

cheating

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, leads, discount, cheating, pricing
